After hitting the opponent into the air with the Eight Trigrams Palms Revolving Heaven, Hinata continues her assault with several more hits and then a final concentrated hit with both her palms that sends the opponent flying away from her.

[[es:Ocho Trigramas Palmas Gemelas]]
